speaker: Doctor
text: Good morning, Mr. Johnson. How have you been feeling lately, especially with your current medications?

speaker: Patient
text: Morning, Doctor. I've been okay, but I noticed some bruising on my arms and legs. I'm worried it might be the warfarin.

speaker: Doctor
text: I understand your concern. Bruising can happen with warfarin. When was your last INR check?

speaker: Patient
text: It was last week, and they said it was a bit high, but they didn't change my dose.

speaker: Doctor
text: Given the bruising and your INR results, we might need to adjust your warfarin dose. Have you had any changes in your diet or new medications?

speaker: Patient
text: No new medications, but I did start eating more leafy greens. Could that be affecting it?
